keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: The steamer Ericsson, from Hatteras, with the D'Epineull Zouaves on board, arrived here this (Friday) afternoon.

headline.main: IMPORTANT FROM FORT MONROE,; Movements of the Burnside Expedition. Vessels Departing from Hatteras in the Direction of Roanoke Island. Panic of the Rebels at Norfolk and Richmond. The Transfer of Beauregard to Kentucky.

docs.abstract: Brig. Gen. Beauregard reportedly transferred to Kentucky
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamer Ericsson, from Hatteras, with the D'Epineull Zouaves on board, arrived here this (Friday) afternoon.
